🐻Hello Bearo brothers and sisters,
We have made some adjustments to ensure a smooth transition to the new operational plans. We have put together a few items to share with you around our team planning and status updates.

**Onboarding**
After careful consideration and evaluation, we have decided to move in a different direction from the CEO and Marketing Director candidates that Ezek had recommended. The professionals who fill these roles will have crucial impacts on our project’s direction and long-term development. Therefore, we are approaching other candidates (CEO & consultant) who would be a better fit for this project. Furthermore, PHANTACi and Ezek have reached an agreement to adjust the PhantaBear team. Superman and Can will be the core of the team to ensure the progress and execution of the project. We also have a technical project manager and marketing planners joining the team on May 9. We will add additional positions to expand our team with different professional fields.

**Roadmap**
Regarding the utilities of Phancy Pets and the staking (point) system which were planned by Ezek, the framework and the design do not meet our project plan. Therefore, we must evaluate carefully whether the staking (point) system will have a positive impact on the project. Before drafting a full plan, we will put our focus on developing the PhantaBear website and PhantaBear online store. Meanwhile, we will work closely with our new project manager to improve efficiencies, initiate new plans, and develop more exclusive activities for holders.

**Community**
In May, we organized the “PhantaBear x Alpacadabraz x FOMO DOG： The Voice of nature Singing Battle 2022” and we will start executing an event proposed by the winner of the “Community Event Proposal Competition”. Also, we have organized some exclusive benefits like the raffles for the “Limited Edition Golden Autographed Bear” and “JAY CHOU CARNIVAL WORLD TOUR Concert Ticket” to our holders. Moving forward, we would like to shape the PhantaBear community towards three core elements: Music, Art, and Fashion. We are very grateful for all of the contributions from our Mod Team and Bearos from the community and we would like to include their names in future activities and announcements, so everyone in the community knows who has been working hard behind the scenes.

**＊ "PhantaBear 2022 Spring/Summer Limited T-Shirt" status update:**
The team submitted the design draft to the factory for production at the end of March, but due to the pandemic, the factory's production line, raw materials, and cargo transportation have been greatly affected. The shirt will be delivered to the PhantaBear team by the end of June and  distribution will then begin.

We know everyone is anxious about the recent changes, we feel the same! But we also believe**" THE BEST IS YET TO COME"**. We have faced many challenges along the way, but we need to stay united and continue to move in the right direction. Step by step, we will make improvements. Our success will be a result of the sum of these dedicated efforts.

Thank you for all your support and patience, we are confident that our journey onwards will be fruitful and fulfilling.

Superman/Can
